title: GDG DevFest Switzerland 2018 Announced
brief: GDG DevFest Switzerland 2018 has been announced! The 3rd edition of the biggest conference about Google technologies in Switzerland will take place on **October 20-21** (calendar week 42) in **Rapperswil**.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: GDG DevFest Switzerland 2018 is announced! The 3rd edition of the biggest conference around Google technologies in Switzerland will take place on **October 20-21** in the beautiful city of Rapperswil. That means that it is time to open our [call for talk submissions](http://bit.ly/dfch18-c4p).
